revised_title: Obituaries and Achievements of Notable Scientists
tldr: This issue of the 'Notes and Records of the Royal Society of London' features obituaries of several distinguished scientists and a summary of their significant contributions to various fields of science. The article highlights the diverse range of research areas, from embryology and microbiology to inorganic chemistry and upper atmosphere physics, showcasing the breadth of scientific knowledge and discovery.
scientific_discipline: Biographies and Book Reviews > Obituaries and Scientific Achievements
